overview: Together with Match TV, we remembered the legendary moments of the games of the past years and enhanced them with graphics and vfx. Unearthed the real records of commentators. They drew everyone so that the players looked more like themselves than Ronaldo looked like his bronze bust. All this was revived mainly in tunbum. And we tried to make the transitions smooth, so that all the players were like from the same team.
title: Match – Euro 2020
